alert.note: Alert for Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pickens County through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pickens, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easley, Pickens, Liberty, Sunset and Pumpkintown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
